description: The lone warrior walks into a dense forest. No memories and no goal. In front of him, a wide plain surrounded be trees. Can he find any clues here?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Argh....heh....

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: I've gotten out of shape since...since...eh...

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Where am I actually? Hello, sir, can I, eh, ask you something?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: What the...? Who.. Where.. Wha...?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Yes, ehm, I was wondering if you could tell me where I am currently? I know it's a weird question.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Ehem, well thats a completely legit question. It's only normal you came to me for such advice! You see, we are in...

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: A forest! If you have a sharp eye like me you notice that from the many trees!

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Well, yes, I was aware of that. I meant the name. This area does have a name right?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Ah yes! I knew that, I was just testing you. Let's see this forest...ehm...err...

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: It's called...'Ever So Green Forest'.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: No no no, hehe, wait no, ehm.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: ...You know what, I already remembered... Thanks for your help.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Wait, wait, wait! Don't go yet.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: ...What.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Can you tell me what this place is called, cause I have no freaking clue.

parts.speaker: tonystark
parts.text: Tony? Are you talking to yourself again? You need to prepare!

parts.speaker: tonystark
parts.text: Oh, Steve, well no, I was talking to this young fellow. He needed me advice!

parts.speaker: tonystark
parts.text: What? Who would ever need your advice, hold on.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Hmmmm, I don't recognize you. You look confused. Soldier, what's your name.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: My name? It's $player.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: $player? Hmmm... No, that name doesn't say anything to me.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: $player, does the word 'Apophis', mean anything to you?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Apophis? No, it doesn't. To be honest with you, I don't remember much before yesterday.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Amnesia? That kind of explains your bewildered look. Either that or you're lying.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Oh no, no, no! I'm not the enemy. If you're after them, I've been running away from them since yesterday.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: What?! You actually succesfully kept Apophis' warriors off your back for 2 days? Alone?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Yes, and well, now you mention it... There was one of them chasing me just now.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: That means we don't have much time. Come with us, $player. Fight with us for now.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Alright, eh, what is your name?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Steve. Steve Rogers.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Alright Steve, let's work together on this one.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Hohohohold up there.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Tony, Stark. As our new, 3rd member, it is only normal that I brief you on our mission! It's a real tough one though!

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: We lost our HQ. We can't really remember how. What we do now is that it's currently in enemy hands!

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: It is now your duty too, to retake this fortress!!!

parts.speaker: tonystark
parts.text: Yeah, and we don't have all day, Tony. There is somebody in there waiting.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: $player, stay focused and follow our direction. Eliminate any enemy in sight.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Let's move out team!
